title: The League Community
body:
Hello fellow summoners,
I write today to address an issue that even though is rare is also a very annoying one. In many normal games, it is very frequent for people to instant lock in any champion in any role that THEY want to play, not considering the current team's wishes, without asking. Even though this is frequent in normals, this has also happened in Ranked Solo/Duo and Flex. I wish there can be some new way to prevent such behavioural issues, if they can't be decent humans than why offer them a chance to play the game? I recently encountered a person who autolocked Kayn jungle even though he was given support and later added the excuse that: "I don't want to play support... ... If I want to play a role, I just play it, why do I need to ask?" I would like a Rioter to address this issue and come up with a way to deal with it. Yes, I know you can dodge but this has many downsides such as losing LP, having a waiting time for dodging and other issues. If one was to have a smurf than this would be no problem, but I can confirm that many people would like to keep playing on their main account as a priority. If anyone has a solution that anyone can implement, I wish to be informed immediately.
Thank you all for your time and best of luck on the Fields Of Justice!
Fellow League of Legends player - SilentXKiller
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
